column1: good length outside off, and Uthappa defends it away. Bhuvi starts off with two slips
back of a length, but just outside off. Fended off the back foot towards cover
short on off, and cramping into his body. Tries to work it towards the leg side, but hits his body
stays back of a length again. Uthappa walks across to the off side and blocks off the back foot. Four dots to start the match. Can he finish well?
full outside off, and tapped with soft hands to point. Slight hesitation, but they scamper across for the single eventually
back of a length first up to Lynn. Superb accuracy from Bhuvneshwar, which forces Lynn to defend off the back foot

back of a length on off, and angling into Uthappa. Worked off his body to square leg, and they take off for the run. Shakib's throw at the striker's end isn't a direct hit, or else Lynn would've been in trouble
big swing of the bat from Lynn, but misses completely. Good length outside off, and just about enough room to free his arms
short outside off, and Lynn crunches this off the back foot. Slapped past backward point as the ball races away for a boundary. Manish Pandey groans 'nooo' as Lynn leans into that shot

full on middle, and driven inside out over Stanlake. Williamson, at mid off, goes running backwards, and even sticks his hand out, but the ball drops out of his right hand. Terrific effort, but just too difficult. Another boundary
back of a length outside off. Angling into Lynn, and defended off the back foot
good length on middle and angling sharply into Lynn. The batsman had made some room on the leg side, so Stanlake did well to follow him. Lynn taps it towards point
short outside off, and fended off the back foot towards the off side. They jog across for the single

back of a length outside off, and Lynn gives it a big heave. Hits it over the non-striker, but bounces just in front of mid on. The fielder jumps over the ball, and it races away to the boundary thereafter. Mistimed shot but gets four
good length on middle, and heaved towards midwicket. Mistimed once again, but gets off strike

appeal for caught behind! But not given. Williamson reviews straightaway. Sunrisers look convinced. It was a good length ball outside off, and jagging just into Uthappa. He tried to run it fine, but the ball took the outside edge. UltraEdge shows a big spike, and the umpire has to reverse his decision
good length outside off, and angling further away. Perfect ball to the new man to get his eye in. Slaps this square, and beats both point and third man
good length, and outside off. Rana sticks his bat out and pokes it towards point. Calls early for the single
short ball first up, and Rana gets his eyes off the ball! Gets big on him, and hits his handle as Rana tries to look away. Lands safe, just in front of point. Quick!
back of a length outside off and Lynn backs away. Chops it down to third man this time
good length on middle stump, but angling across Rana. Shoulders his arms this time
beauty! Nice shape, and the ball just misses Rana's outside edge. Good length on middle stump and angling tantalisingly away from Rana. He tried to defend, but played it down the wrong line
good length on leg and Rana's cramped for room this time. Tapped to cover off the back foot, but rather unconvincingly

another excellent ball! Four dots to end the over. Similar ball to the one previously in the over. Good length on middle, and beautifully angling away from Rana as he tries to defend. He's lucky that didn't fine the outside edge
starts off with the slower ball. Did that slip out of his hand? It's short on middle, and Lynn tries to pull. But he's through his shot too early. Mistimed towards short fine leg

good length, but wide outside off. Lynn backs away and then slashes this over point. Three men in the infield, but clears all of them. The chase from the fielders are futile. Replays suggest it's the knuckleball

Lynn's lucky this time! Full on off, and he tries to smack this over the bowler's head. Except, this time Lynn finds the bat's inside edge and sends it fine down the leg side. Another knuckleball this time, but much better execution
overpitched wide outside off. Lynn sticks his bat out, and cuts this past point. Backward point dives to his right and manages to get fingertips to it
full and wide outside off again! Lynn backs away and therefore can't reach at it. Through to the keeper
crunched through the covers! Raw power on display here. Pitched up on off, and Lynn swings his bat with all the force of this world. Smacked to the wide long-off boundary
good length on middle and spins into Lynn! Cramped for space, and manages to push it towards cover
tossed up on middle, and Rana attempts a wide leg-side heave. Hit towards midwicket, but was in the air for a while
full on off, and spins away from Lynn. He walks across to the off side and nudges towards midwicket

flighted on middle stump, and Rana's picked this length early! Down on one knee, and slog swept over cow corner. Not timed extremely well, but enough behind Rana's swing to take it into the stands. First six off Rashid this season
full on leg stump, and spinning across Rana's body. Defends the wrong'un off the front foot
half-tracker on middle, and spinning away from Rana. He backs away, and cuts this hard past point. No stopping that!
good length on off, and spinning into Lynn. Punched to cover
full on off, and Lynn tries to crunch this past cover again. Mistimed towards the off side, but manages to take the single
good length outside off, and zipping straight through. Tries to cut but misses
good length outside off again, and Rana cuts it square to the man in the deep
full just outside off, Lynn backs away and carves it towards point
full on off stump, and bunted down the ground to long on
goes short first up. Tapped off the back foot to third man, and Yusuf misfields! The ball slips through his hands and almost goes to the boundary. Does well to pull it back
good length on middle, and fended off the front foot. Lynn went to the leg side but Stanlake's delivery angle followed him. Rana wanted the single, but Lynn wasn't sure. They complete it eventually
short on leg stump, and the ball soars over Rana's head. He happily gets under the line of this delivery

Pandey takes a screamer! Stanlake celebrates but the wicket's all Pandey's. Cuts this ball super hard, but Pandey - at point - dives to his right and sticks both hands out. The ball popped out of his hand, but managed to take the catch eventually as Pandey returned back to Earth. Excellent!
welcomes him with a short ball on leg stump. Narine goes deep into his crease, and defends off the back foot
back of a length on middle, and angling away from Narine. My, my, he shoulders his arms in a T20
full outside off, and Lynn drives away from his body. Straight to cover
good length just outside off, and Lynn cuts this square. Played off the front foot, but stopped by Bhuvi at point
good length outside off, and cut square to the man in the deep. They walk across for the single
good length on off, and Narine tries to work it on the leg side. Takes the leading edge towards cover instead
full on middle, and Lynn backs away. Tries to smack this down the ground but mistimed to long off

Pandey again, but this time he drops it! Full on off, and Narine went through with the golf swing. Hit it well, and looked like it was gonna go over long on, but Pandey jumped, took the catch, and then threw it back in since he was falling over. Tried to return and complete the catch, but the ball falls short. He threw the ball back in with just a bit too much power. Saves five runs nonetheless. Time out
full outside leg, and Narine tries to swing towards the leg side. Inside edge, but falls short of the keeper diving to his right
back of a length outside leg, and Narine makes room on the leg side. Pulled, but mistimed, over square leg to the man in the deep

full outside off, and Lynn's done waiting. Makes room to the leg side and muscles this over the bowler's head. Rashid Khan - at long on - runs to his left and tries to take a diving catch. Manages to get his left hand to it, but the ball pops out, then hits his shoulder, and then finally falls beyond the boundary
yorker on leg stump and Lynn does well to squeeze this away towards the off side
Kaul unlucky again! Overpitched on off stump, and Lynn's drive takes the inside edge. Misses leg stump and runs away to the fine-leg boundary
short on off, and Lynn tries to flat-bat this towards the off side. Comes off the bat's top half, and in the air. Lands just short of cover!
full outside off, and Narine dances down the wicket. Crunches a drive past cover, but Yusuf Pathan's full-stretched dive at long off saves the boundary
full toss outside leg stump, and Narine misses the pull. But the keeper can't hold onto it either, which forces Stanlake - at short fine leg - to go chasing behind it

stumped? The umpire's going upstairs. Good-length ball outside off, and the ball spins away from Narine this time. Tries to smash this over the bowler's head, but misses it completely. Replays suggest that Narine got his backfoot down in time though. Not out

good length outside off, and the ball spins away from Narine again. He tries to hit it over cover, but Narine manages to slice this over point! Kaul chases after it, but the ball picks up pace after hitting the practice pitches. Can't pull it back

KW to the rescue! Good length outside off, and the arm ball does the trick. Narine swings through the line of the ball, but not off the meat of the bat. In the air for ages, and Williamson runs back from midwicket to complete the catch
tossed up on off stump, and driven down the ground past Shakib. Straight to long off
low full toss outside off, and Karthik attempts to drive over cover. Takes the bat's toe end, but falls just over cover. The man in the deep cleans up
back of a length on middle stump. No spin this time, and DK flicks it off his pads to midwicket
good length on off, and spinning into Lynn. Whipped off his pads to square leg
quicker one, and on a good length. Angling into Karthik, who clips it off his pads to square leg
back of a length on middle stump. Lynn goes deep onto the back foot and muscles it to midwicket
tossed up on middle and leg. DK chooses to defend off the front foot
good length, just outside off. Turns it towards the leg side with soft hands. Played in the gap, which allows DK to take the single. Rashid has to go chasing after it
full on leg stump, and turned off his pads to short fine leg
falls for 49! Good length on middle, and Lynn punches this too soon. The ball stuck up after pitching, forcing the error from Lynn, and Shakib dives to his left to take a one-handed stunner
darts it into Russell's pads, and he flicks towards deep backward square. Could've easily gone to the man at short leg too
tossed up on off stump, but Russell's not biting the apple. Defended off the front foot
full on off, and driven with the turn down to wide long on
good length on middle, and angling into his pads. Tries to flick square, but hits his pad instead
Full outside off, and Russell slaps this over point. Hooda races to his left and sticks his hand out, and even throws the ball in, but his back leg is hitting the boundary

Poor from Russell. Full outside off, and Dre Russ slaps this over point once again. Slices it this time, and Pandey - at point - runs towards the boundary to complete an excellent diving catch! Slides across the ground after pocketing that. Pandey's been electric today
back of a length and just outside off. Fended off the back foot with soft hands
overpitched on off stump. Almost a yorker, but DK does well to push it towards cover
good length on off stump, and blocked off the back foot. Played to point
short outside off, and Gill tries to cut it over the slip cordon. Too high and through to Saha. Time out again
good length outside off, and DK walks down the wicket. Punches to deep extra cover thereafter
good length outside off, but DK rides the bounce to punch this with the bat's open face. Beats point, and third man can't cut it off either
full just outside off. Driven down the ground to mid off
full on off stump, and his drive takes the outside edge. Goes to third man, where Stanlake is positioned
full on off, and he slices it this time. The ball goes to mid-off, allowing them to take the single
good length on middle, and misses the leg-side flick. Hits his pad and dribbles away to square leg
full on off, and spinning away from DK. Driven down the ground to long on
flighted outside off, and Gill check-drives. Hits it well, but Dhawan at wide long off cleans up
full on leg stump, and DK misses the defense. Hits his pad, and the ball goes to the leg side for a run. The umpire says bat first
full just outside off. Defended off the front foot towards cover. Slightly slower this time, meaning more revs on that delivery
good length on middle stump, and Gill turns it off his pads to fine leg
good length on middle, and it's pulled off the back foot to deep midwicket. He'll keep strike
starts off with the slower ball. Short on middle, and DK flicks it fine off his pads. Goes to fine leg this time
full outside off, and driven away from his body. Not timed well, and easily stopped by cover
full, but wide outside off. Gill tries to drive towards the off side again, but comes off the bat's inside half. Hit to midwicket

soft dismissal! Good length outside off, and swinging away from Gill. He tries to muscle this over the infield, but takes the top edge. Shakib - at cover - takes a few steps back and completes the catch from near his face. Bhuvi's knuckleball earns him a wicket
short outside off, and chopped on to third man for a walking single
good length on off stump, and too close to Mavi for the cut. Almost takes the bat's edge but eventually safe through to the keeper
delicate, but only a single. Full on off, and he reverse paddles it to short third man
full on leg stump, and going straight through. Takes the batsman's pads, and trickles down to short fine leg
misses the outside edge! Full on off stump, but it's the flipper this time. Zips on after pitching, and DK defends down the wrong line. Smartly taken by the keeper
delicately played! Good length on off, and DK sticks his bat out to cut it super late. Beats short third man and races away for four
full on off, and he sweeps behind square to fine leg. Had to drag it from outside off eventually
full on middle stump, and Mavi's sweep goes to short fine leg. Rashid appeals for the lbw, but the umpire thinks it's bat first. Williamson reviews.. Replays show glove first
full outside off, and DK hits it over Bhuvneshwar's head. Off the bat's toe end and falls in front of long off. Oh dear, front-foot no-ball too. Free hit
knuckle ball on off, but Karthik's spotted the length early. Big stride forward and muscled over the bowler's head. Lands beyond the sightscreen. Full use of the free hit!
slower ball that DK can't connect with. Good length on off but takes ages to get to the batsman. Misses the late cut
edged! Full outside off, and Karthik's drive away from his body takes the outside edge. Pocketed by Saha moving to his right
good length on off stump, but angling across the batsman. Tries to carve it towards point, but goes past the outside edge and through to the keeper. Bhuvi wants to review, but they're out of reviews.

caught, but no ball! Full on off, and Johnson backed away to free his arms. Hit it towards cover, but slices it into the air. KW takes the catch, and even starts celebrating, before Bhuvi tells him about the no ball. Free hit
full on off, and Mavi drags this towards the leg side. Manages to muscle this towards long on
good length on off, and Johnson tries to pull towards cow corner. Takes the top edge, but lands just short of Stanlake at third man. Finishes with 3 for 26
full on off, and muscled inside out over cover. Dhawan at wide long off has to run to his left, but manages to parry this back into play
full on middle stump and Mavi backs away. Carves it off the back foot to point on this occasion
full outside off, and Johnson's wild swing doesn't connect. Goes under his bat and through to the keeper
full on middle and Johnson manages to bunt it to long off
good length on off, and angling into Mavi. Tries to play the uppercut but nowhere near that shot

overpitched, but wide outside off. Too far for Mavi, but he manages to stick his bat out. Takes the toe end, and top-edges it behind the keeper. Bhuvneshwar and Stanlake both try to take the catch, and the Indian gets there first. Does well to ensure he doesn't crash into big Billy S. KKR finish on 138 for 8
good length on off, and angling across Saha. Left alone by the batsman, and slightly unlucky that the umpire calls it a wide. It was well inside the tramlines
good length on off stump, defended
full on off, and swinging into Saha. Tries to slog towards the leg side but the ball goes between bat and pad. How did that miss the top of off stump?
awry from Johnson. Full, but pitched wide outside leg stump
back of a length on middle and hits Saha's gloves. Fended towards point
good length on off, and jagging into Saha again. Fended off the back foot with soft hands this time
full on leg, and Saha uses his wrists to whip it off his pads to deep backward square. Fine leg can't intercept either
full on off, and checks his drive at the last second. Pushed to mid off
back of a length on leg stump, and Dhawan dabs it down to third man. Gets off the mark
good length on off, and Saha pulls it square. Hit off the bat's middle, and manages to clear midwicket by a few feet. No one in the deep
good length just outside off. Rides the bounce and taps it to point. Calls early for the single
short on off and going away from Dhawan. Tries to play the uppercut, but misses. Collected by DK from in front of his pace
short on off again, but Dhawan's quick to pounce on that length. Pulls it along the ground and beats midwicket on its way to the boundary
goes short again! Pitches on leg stump, and Dhawan misses the pull this time. He's lucky that didn't take a bit of glove on the way to the keeper
full on off, and Saha lifts this over midwicket. Off the bat's toe end, so it doesn't have the legs to go the boundary
good length on off, and shaping away from Saha. Pokes at it, and tapped to Gill at point
too short on middle, and Saha is quick to swivel and pull. Hit very square and there's no one there in the boundary. Collects another four
overpitched, slower ball outside off. Saha tries to drive away from his body but is foxed by the pace. The umpire feels it's a wide
another slower ball wide outside off. Saha's in position to lean into that shot, and times it extremely well past cover. Silences the Kolkata crowd again
full on off, and Saha crunches this over mid on! In Saha's arc, and he check-drives it to the on side. Enough behind it to beat the infield
back of a length on leg stump. Cramps Saha for room, but still manages to flick it behind square off the back foot
out first ball! Full on leg, and spinning further away from Saha. Tries to flick it fine, but takes a feather edge off his bat. Excellent take from DK and that's got Narine grinning!
tossed up on off, and spinning into his pads. Tries to defend, but hits his pad. In the air for a bit, which forces DK to try and catch it. Falls just short of him
arm ball on middle stump. Pitches full, and Williamson blocks off the back foot
good length on off and angling into KW. Turned off his pads to deep midwicket. Gets off the mark
good length on leg stump. No spin this time, and Dhawan pulls to deep midwicket for a walking run
good length just outside off. Punched off the back foot to long on. Successful over from Narine
short on off stump, but zipping into his pads. Whipped off his pads to short fine leg
back of a length on leg stump, worked off his pads to the man in the deep on the leg side
full just outside off, and driven with the legspin past cover. Long off tries to run to his left, but can't stop it from finding the boundary
punched through the infield! Textbook stuff from Williamson. Good length on off, and punched off the back foot between cover and cover point
good length outside off, and he tries to carve it to point. Takes the bat's inside edge and ricochets onto his pads
full, and just outside off. Big stride forward and defended towards the on side
full outside leg stump. Dhawan tries to sweep, but can't connect

the zing bails have lit up! Overpitched on leg stump, and almost a yorker from Narine. Dhawan tries to defend but the ball sneaks under his bat. Hits his back leg, and then crashes into the base of off stump. Sunrisers lose their openers
full outside off, and defended with soft hands towards the off side. Slight hesitation from the batsmen, and Pandey chooses not to run
full on off this time. Defended, once again, with soft hands. The ball is tapped back to Narine
good length on off, and spinning away from Pandey. Cut off the back foot to the man at point
good length outside off, but sharply spins inwards. Pandey mistimes his punch back to the bowler
good length outside off, and poked off the back foot. Takes the outside edge, but only to Lynn at short third man. No runs off the bat in the over
tossed up full outside off, and Williamson drives with the spin. Excellent stop by Russell at cover though, diving forward
good length on middle, and spinning away. Cut off the back foot to cover again
good length on leg and spinning across Williamson. Tries to pull square but is through his shot way too early. Comes off the bat's toe end, and goes past Kuldeep's right
tossed up on middle stump, and Pandey takes a big wind up, but eventually checks his shot. Defended back to Kuldeep
full on off, and that's hit back hard to Kuldeep. He can't get his fingertips to it, and the ball runs down to long on
full on middle stump, and his leg-side push takes a leading edge. The ball goes towards cover instead, and enough time to take the single
full outside off, but it zips straight through off the surface. Williamson tried to defend for the spin, but can't connect
full on off, and KW tries to paddle this fine. Bottom-edges it because of the full-ish nature of the delivery and goes to the leg side. They want to appeal for the lbw, but eventually choose not to
full just outside off, and tapped down the ground to long on
good length on middle, and KW goes deep into his crease. Punches to midwicket, but Lynn does well to get his body behind it
flatter ball on middle stump, worked to midwicket off the back foot and they're off for the quick single. Chance of a run-out at the non-striker's, but it's not a direct hit
tossed up outside off, and driven away from his body to cover. Russell picks it up in a flash and has a shy at the stumps. Direct hit, but Williamson is safe

flighted on middle stump, and Pandey comes down the wicket. Almost yorks himself,  but manages to lift it over Kuldeep eventually. The umpire goes on the floor - trying to duck - as the shot trickles down to long on
good length on off stump, but spinning into Williamson. Turned off his pads to square leg
flighted on leg stump. Williamson pushes at it, inside out, to long off

slow finger of death! Full on leg stump, and Pandey defends it down the wrong line. He tried to play in front of middle stump, but the ball didn't spin at all. Hits his front leg, and the umpire agrees to Kuldeep's appeal. The former KKR player has to go back. Time out as well
tossed up on off stump. Shakib takes a big stride forward and sweeps it square to the man in the deep
full on middle stump, and flicked to fine leg. Williamson calls early for the second run
full on off, and spinning away from Shakib. Pushed down the ground to long off
tossed up, but wide outside off. Stays on the backfoot and slashes it square to the man in the deep
full on off, and spinning away from Shakib. Defended towards cover
full on middle stump, spins into Shakib this time. He flicks it off his pads to midwicket
good length on off, and spinning into KW. Punched to Russell at mid on, but misfield!
full on leg stump, but the wrong'un to end the over. Shakib does well to fend it off the back foot
full on middle stump. Williamson almost yorks himself, and squeezes towards the legside
half-tracker on middle, and Williamson goes deep into the crease. Plenty of time to pull this along the ground. Crashes into the cow-corner boundary
leaking runs! Good length on leg, and KW pulls this behind square. The man had just moved straighter after the previous shot, and Williamson chose that new vacant spot to perfection
good length outside off, and he almost chops onto his stumps! Too close to his body for the cut
good length outside off, and this time the cut shot is hit well. Chawla's the man in the deep
tossed up on leg stump, but Shakib's up to the challenge. Swept behind square to the fielder in the deep
short on off, and cut hard to point. The fielder manages to get his body behind that, and takes the pace off the ball
full just outside off stump. Opens the bat's face and runs it down fine to third man
low full toss on off stump. Almost a yorker, and he taps it back to Russell. Fielded off the followthrough but the spectators celebrate the crowd catch instead
top edged over the keeper! Short on leg, and Shakib's pull takes the top edge. Karthik's not a tall man, and he's got no chance in stopping that
mistimed, but over mid off! Full on off, and Shakib lifts this over Uthappa at mid off. Not hit well, but enough behind that shot to take in beyond the infield

slapped over point! First six of this innings. Short on off, and that's been cut very hard. Looked like third man could, perhaps, take a catch, but he eventually was also just a spectator. Fourteen runs off the last three balls
back of a length, on the fourth-stump line. Punched off the back foot to long on
good length just outside off, and Shakib cuts it hard past the man at point. Work for the man in the deep, but he manages to pull it back
good length on off, but spinning further away. Cut off the back foot to the fielder in the deep
good length outside off, and spinning further away from the right-handed batsman. Cut off the back foot to deep extra cover
full just outside off stump. Pushed square off the front foot to the man in the deep
full on off, and pushed to long off for a walking single. Sees another Narine over out
back of a length outside off, and then spinning into KW. Fended off the back foot
good length on off, and that's been uncomfortably pulled to deep midwicket
full, but very wide outside leg stump. Shakib, however, backed away a lot towards the leg side. Bunted down the ground to long on
full on leg, and that's been comfortably swept to deep backward square
full on leg, and Shakib backs away before driving to long off. Easy single collected
good length outside off. Goes deep into the crease and cuts to deep extra cover
back of a length on off, and that's 143.2kph first up. Pulled to the man in the deep
good length on middle, and angling into his body. Mistimes the pull, and trickles down to fine leg
good length on middle, and KW uses the pace to help this over fine leg! Gets his front leg out of the way and then pulls it over the square-leg umpire's head
good length, but wide outside off. Tries to cut but misses
good length outside off, and KW's cut takes the inside edge. Almost chopped on, but hits his pads. They take off for the single, and Mavi hits the stumps at the striker's end. Shakib's safe, though
good length on middle stump, and he helps the pull to fine leg to keep the strike
full on leg stump. Shakib shimmies down the wicket and drives it down to long on
full on off stump, and Williamson bunts it to long on for another run
full on off stump, and Shakib fends it off the front foot
good length on off, but spinning away from Shakib. Tries to cut but the extra bounce takes it over his bat

breaks leg stump! Good length on leg, but Shakib's caught in two minds. Chooses to defend eventually, but the ball sneaks through between bat and pad. This game's not over yet, folks! But for now...it's the time out

overpitched outside off, and the new man fails to squeeze it away. Hits his back leg, but where did it hit his leg? Impact outside off, so the batsman should be safe. Apparently, there was an inside edge as well
good length, just outside off. Punched off the back foot to long off
good length outside off, but spinning away from him. Opens his bat's face and turns it down to third man
full on off, and fended back to Narine
good length outside off, and Hooda cuts it square to the man in the deep
good length just outside off. Spins away from KW, but manages to punch to long off. His fifty as well!
full on off, but Hooda comes dancing down the wicket. Pushes to wide long on to see Narine's spell off
full on off, and he mistimes a leg-side slog to deep backward square
full on leg stump, and KW clips it off his pads, but straight to Russell at square leg. Soft dismissal! Big groan from Williamson as he sees Russell complete the catch
full on off stump, and Yusuf brings out the front-foot defense
back of a length on leg stump. Tapped off the back foot to midwicket and Russell collects
short on leg stump, and Yusuf chooses to let it go through. Good call, as the umpire calls it a wide
full on off, and Yusuf takes a step forward and bangs this through the cover-region. Wide long off tries chasing behind it, but it's just too well hit
good length on off Yusuf punches it past cover for a couple. Sunrisers need 13 off 12 balls
good length outside off, and Hooda misses the pull shot. The ball sneaks under his bat and through to DK
overpitched wide outside off, and that's been slashed hard to deep point. Only a single
good length on off, and that's been punched off the back foot. Lynn's at cover, but the ball just goes over his head. Pathan's lucky but he'll take the boundary
yorker just outside off. Dug away towards the leg side for a quick single. Sunrisers need seven off eight
good length just outside off. Hooda walks across to the off side, and flicks to midwicket. Calls for the run early

ends with a six! Short on off, and Yusuf pulls it away. Top-edged, but enough power behind the big man to take it over the boundary behind square. Sunrisers Hyderabad win in Kolkata for the first time ever!
